record.field: # -- Condiciones -- # VAC_AR = payslip.struct_id.code == 'VAC-AR' result = VAC_AR or False

# -- Variables -- # amount = contract.cct_category_id.get_category_value(payslip.date_from) or contract.amount basic_div_days = current_contract.basic_div.days or 30
# -- Mensualizados -- # monthly_amount = contract.is_wage_accurate and amount / 30 monthly_qty = monthly_amount and 30 monthly_name = monthly_qty and "SUELDO BASICO"
# -- Jornalizados -- # hourly_amount = amount hourly_qty = worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours hourly_name = hourly_qty and "HORAS NORMALES"
# -- Caso: Jornada Reducida -- # afip_modalidad_parcial = [1, 21, 412, 409, 411, 408, 416, 415, 410, 407, 306, 305, 304] jornada_reducida = contract.afip_modalidad_contratacion_id.afip_id in afip_modalidad_parcial reducida_monthly_hours = worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours / worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days * basic_div_days reducida_amount = jornada_reducida and contract.is_wage_accurate and amount / current_contract.basic_div.hours reducida_qty = jornada_reducida and (contract.is_wage_accurate and reducida_monthly_hours or worked_days.WORK100.number_of_hours) reducida_name = reducida_qty and "HORAS NORMALES"
# -- Calculo -- # result = reducida_amount or monthly_amount or hourly_amount result_qty = reducida_qty or monthly_qty or hourly_qty result_name = reducida_name or monthly_name or hourly_name

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #result = employee.service_duration_years > 0.00 or False result = employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 or False

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #result = employee.service_duration_years > 0.00 or False result = employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 or False

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #part_4_5 = ['AP0','AI0'] #es_part_4_5 = contract.cct_category_id.code in part_4_5 #result = sindicato_upadep and es_part_4_5 and current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE or False result= current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE or False

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #part_4_5 = ['AP0','AI0'] #es_part_4_5 = contract.cct_category_id.code in part_4_5 #result = sindicato_upadep and current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE or False result= current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE or False

result_name = 'ASIGNACION OP. RAYOS X' result = payslip.rule_parameter('UPADEP_RX')
# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #feupa = inputs.H050 feupa = worked_days.H050 and worked_days.H050.number_of_hours > 0.00 result = feupa or False
# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #feupa = inputs.H050 feupa = worked_days.H050 and worked_days.H050.number_of_hours > 0.00 result = feupa or False
# -- Condiciones -- # input_H050_AJ = inputs.H050_AJ or False result = input_H050_AJ or False
# -- Condiciones -- # periodoAeronautico = 1 esPeriodoAero = payslip.date_from.month == periodoAeronautico result = esPeriodoAero or False
result_name = 'DIA DEL AERONAUTICO' pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H111 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H111.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H112 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H112.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato lic = worked_days.H117 or False result = sindicato_upadep and lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H117.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H102 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H102.number_of_days*-1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H103 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H103.number_of_days*-1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H104 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H104.number_of_days*-1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H105 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H105.number_of_days*-1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H106 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H106.number_of_days*-1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H107 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H107.number_of_days * -1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H108 or False result = lic or False

result_qty = worked_days.H108.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = ((BASIC + antiguedad)/30)*1.0833 ''' result_qty = worked_days.H108.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = result_rules.H010.total if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 if "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato: patente_esp = result_rules.H012.total if current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE else 0.00 rx = result_rules.H055.total if inputs.H055 else 0.00 feriados = result_rules.H050.total if inputs.H050 else 0.00 total_hs_extras = 0.00 total_hs_extras+= result_rules.H142.total if worked_days.H142 and worked_days.H142.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 #if contract.cct_category_id.code not in['AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0','EP5','AP5','AI5']: #Empleado FullTime/Considerar usar divisor if contract.cct_id.basic_div >= 162: total_hs_extras+= H140 if worked_days.H140 and worked_days.H140.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H141 if worked_days.H141 and worked_days.H141.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H143 if worked_days.H143 and worked_days.H143.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H144 if worked_days.H144 and worked_days.H144.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 #if contract.cct_category_id.code in['AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0','EP5','AP5','AI5']:#Empleados PartTime/Considerar usar divisor else: total_hs_extras+= result_rules.H155.total if any(code in ['H140','H141','H143','H144'] for code in worked_days.dict.keys()) else 0.00 result = ((BASIC+antiguedad+rx+patente_esp+feriados+total_hs_extras)/30)*1.0833 else: result = ((BASIC+antiguedad)/30)*1.0833 '''
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H109 or False result = lic or False

result_qty = worked_days.H109.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = ((BASIC + antiguedad)/30)*1.0833 ''' result_qty = worked_days.H109.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = result_rules.H010.total if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 if "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato: patente_esp = result_rules.H012.total if current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE else 0.00 rx = result_rules.H055.total if inputs.H055 else 0.00 feriados = result_rules.H050.total if inputs.H050 else 0.00 total_hs_extras = 0.00 total_hs_extras+= result_rules.H142.total if worked_days.H142 and worked_days.H142.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 #if contract.cct_category_id.code not in['AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0','EP5','AP5','AI5']: #Empleado FullTime/Considerar usar divisor if contract.cct_id.basic_div >= 162: total_hs_extras+= H140 if worked_days.H140 and worked_days.H140.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H141 if worked_days.H141 and worked_days.H141.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H143 if worked_days.H143 and worked_days.H143.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 total_hs_extras+= H144 if worked_days.H144 and worked_days.H144.number_of_hours > 0 else 0.00 #if contract.cct_category_id.code in['AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0','EP5','AP5','AI5']:#Empleados PartTime/Considerar usar divisor else: total_hs_extras+= result_rules.H155.total if any(code in ['H140','H141','H143','H144'] for code in worked_days.dict.keys()) else 0.00 result = ((BASIC+antiguedad+rx+patente_esp+feriados+total_hs_extras)/30)*1.0833 else: result = ((BASIC+antiguedad)/30)*1.0833 '''
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H110 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H110.number_of_days feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 aeronautico = H114 if result_rules.H114 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + aeronautico)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H113 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H113.number_of_days*-1 antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H133 or False result = lic or False
result_qty = worked_days.H133.number_of_days*1 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H132 or False result = lic or False
antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result_qty = worked_days.H132.number_of_days result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H124 or False result = lic or False
antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result_qty = worked_days.H124.number_of_days result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H125 or False result = lic or False
antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result_qty = worked_days.H125.number_of_days result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H122 or False result = lic or False

result_qty = worked_days.H122.number_of_days antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result = (BASIC + antiguedad)/max(1, min(30, worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days)) ''' antiguedad = result_rules.H010_V.total if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 rx = result_rules.H055_V.total if inputs.H055 else 0.00 patente_esp = result_rules.H012_V.total if current_contract.advantages.UPADEP_BPE else 0.00 feriados = result_rules.H050_V.total if inputs.H050 else 0.00 horas_extras = 0.0 if contract.cct_id.basic_div >= 162: H_140 = result_rules.H140.total if worked_days.H140 else 0.00 # Extra al 50 H_141 = result_rules.H141.total if worked_days.H141 else 0.00 # Extra al 100 H_143 = result_rules.H143.total if worked_days.H143 else 0.00 # nocturna al 50 H_144 = result_rules.H144.total if worked_days.H144 else 0.00 #nocturna al 100 horas_extras+= H_140 + H_141 + H_143 + H_144 else: horas_extras+= result_rules.H155.total if any(code in ['H140','H141','H143','H144'] for code in worked_days.dict.keys()) else 0.00
result = ((BASIC+antiguedad+rx+patente_esp+feriados+horas_extras)/30)*1.0833 '''
# -- Condiciones -- # lic = worked_days.H126 or False result = lic or False

antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 result_qty = worked_days.H126.number_of_days pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/30

# -- Condiciones -- # worked_days_codes = [line.code for line in payslip.worked_days_line_ids] lic_codes = ['H102','H103','H104','H105','H106','H107','H108','H109','H111','H112','H113','H117'] lic = any(code in lic_codes for code in worked_days_codes) result = lic or False

antiguedad = result_rules.H010.total if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 H102_quantity = worked_days.H102.number_of_days if worked_days.H102 else 0.00 H103_quantity = worked_days.H103.number_of_days if worked_days.H103 else 0.00 H104_quantity = worked_days.H104.number_of_days if worked_days.H104 else 0.00 H105_quantity = worked_days.H105.number_of_days if worked_days.H105 else 0.00 H106_quantity = worked_days.H106.number_of_days if worked_days.H106 else 0.00 H107_quantity = worked_days.H107.number_of_days if worked_days.H107 else 0.00 H108_quantity = worked_days.H108.number_of_days if worked_days.H108 else 0.00 H109_quantity = worked_days.H109.number_of_days if worked_days.H109 else 0.00 #H110_quantity = worked_days.H110.number_of_days if worked_days.H110 else 0.00 H111_quantity = worked_days.H111.number_of_days if worked_days.H111 else 0.00 H112_quantity = worked_days.H112.number_of_days if worked_days.H112 else 0.00 H113_quantity = worked_days.H113.number_of_days if worked_days.H113 else 0.00 H117_quantity = worked_days.H117.number_of_days if worked_days.H117 else 0.00 diasDeLic = H102_quantity + H103_quantity + H104_quantity +H105_quantity + H106_quantity +H107_quantity +H108_quantity +H109_quantity+ H111_quantity+ H112_quantity+ H113_quantity+ H117_quantity result_qty = diasDeLic result = (BASIC+antiguedad)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # vac = worked_days.H118 or False result = vac or False
result_qty = worked_days.H118.number_of_days pvar = PVAR or 0.00 feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # vac = worked_days.H118 or False VAC_AR = payslip.struct_id.code == 'VAC-AR' or False result = vac and payslip.paid_vacation or VAC_AR or False

result_qty = worked_days.H118.number_of_days * -1 pvar = PVAR or 0.00 if VAC_AR: H010V = H010_V if result_rules.H010_V else 0.00 H012V = H012_V if result_rules.H012_V else 0.00 H055V = H055_V if result_rules.H055_V else 0.00 BASICV = BASIC_VAC if result_rules.BASIC_VAC else 0.00 nuevoCBASIC = BASIC_VAC + H010V + H012V + H055V result = (nuevoCBASIC + pvar) / 25 else: feriados = H050 if inputs.H050 else 0.00 result = (categories.CBASIC - feriados + pvar)/25
# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato ct = inputs.H251 #result = sindicato_upadep and ct or False result = ct or False
# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato cc = inputs.H257 #result = sindicato_upadep and cc or False result = cc or False

# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_BASICO = inputs.H001_AJ result = AJ_BASICO or False
# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_RX = inputs.H010_AJ result = AJ_RX or False

# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_CT = inputs.H251_A result = AJ_CT or False
# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_NOREM = inputs.H252 result = AJ_NOREM or False

# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_MES_ANT = inputs.H185 result = AJ_MES_ANT or False
# -- Condiciones -- # qty = 30 - worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days final = payslip.struct_id.code == 'AR-LFREN' result = qty > 0 and final or False

result_qty = -(30 - worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days) antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 rx = result_rules.H055_V.total if inputs.H055 else 0.00 pat_esp = result_rules.H012.total if result_rules.H012 else 0.00 result = (BASIC +antiguedad+ rx + pat_esp)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # qty = 30 - worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days normal = payslip.struct_id.code == 'AR-BASE' result = qty > 0 and normal or False

result_qty = -(30 - worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days) antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 rx = result_rules.H055_V.total if inputs.H055 else 0.00 pat_esp = result_rules.H012.total if result_rules.H012 else 0.00 result = (BASIC +antiguedad+ rx + pat_esp)/30
# -- Condiciones -- # rd_basic = payslip.aplica_rd rd_amount = payslip.rd_amount != 0.00 result = rd_basic and rd_amount or False
# -- Condiciones -- # bono = inputs.H354 result = bono or False
# -- Condiciones -- # reintegro = inputs.H353 result = reintegro or False
# -- Condiciones -- # reintegro = inputs.H352 result = reintegro or False
# -- Condiciones -- # dias_vac = inputs.H322 result = dias_vac or False

result_qty = inputs.H322.amount_qty # -- Variables -- # amount = contract.cct_category_id.get_category_value(payslip.date_from) or contract.amount antiguedad = H010 if result_rules.H010 else 0.00 pvar_value = PVAR if result_rules.PVAR else 0.00 #Modificacion por LP se suma antiguedad monthly_amount = contract.is_wage_accurate and (amount+antiguedad + pvar_value) / 25
# -- Calculos -- # result_name = 'VACACIONES NO GOZADAS ANIO ANT' result = monthly_amount
# -- Condiciones -- # dias_vac = True if result_rules.H322 else False result = dias_vac or False
# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato hnoc_upadep = worked_days.H142 and worked_days.H142.number_of_hours > 0.00 result = hnoc_upadep or False

#esMesAumento = any(p.from_date == payslip.date_from for p in contract.cct_category_id.category_price_ids) or False result_qty = worked_days.H142.number_of_hours bp = result_rules.H052.total if inputs.H052 else 0.00 ''' if esMesAumento and contract.cct_category_id.code not in ['EP5','AP5','AI5','AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0']: # -- VALORES DE CATEGORIA -- # previus_category_price_ids_list = [cat_id for cat_id in contract.cct_category_id.category_price_ids if payslip.date_from > cat_id.from_date] previus_value = sorted(previus_category_price_ids_list)[0].value basic_average = ((previus_value/30)*10) + ((BASIC/30)*20) rx_average = 0.00 antiguedad_average = 0.0 feriados = 0.0 # -- VERIFICACION DE SINDICATO -- # if "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato: antiguedad_average = (basic_average*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') or 0.00)/100 feriados = result_rules.H050_V.total if inputs.H050 else 0.00 # -- VALORES DE RX -- # if inputs.H055: current_value_rx = payslip.rule_parameter('UPADEP_RX') parameter_list_ids = payslip.env['hr.rule.parameter'].search([('code','=','UPADEP_RX')],limit = 1) previus_version_upadep_rx_list = [version_id for version_id in parameter_list_ids[0].parameter_version_ids if payslip.date_from > version_id.date_from] previus_version_rx_value = sorted(previus_version_upadep_rx_list)[0].parameter_value rx_average = round(((int(previus_version_rx_value)/30)*10) + ((int(current_value_rx)/30)*20),2)
#Patente patente = result_rules.H012.total if result_rules.H012 else 0.00 #-- NUEVO BASICO --# new_basic = basic_average + antiguedad_average + rx_average + feriados + patente new_hr = round(((new_basic/contract.cct_id.basic_div)*0.1333),2) result_name = "HS NOCTURNAS" result = new_hr else: ''' result_name = "HS NOCTURNAS" result = (((categories.CBASIC+bp)/contract.cct_id.basic_div)*0.1333)

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato #no_part_time = contract.cct_category_id.code not in ['EP5','AP5','AI5','AP4','AI4','AP0','AI0'] es_fulltime = contract.cct_id.basic_div >= 162 hnoc_upadep = worked_days.H140 and worked_days.H140.number_of_hours > 0.00 result = hnoc_upadep and es_fulltime or False

esMesAumento = any(p.from_date == payslip.date_from for p in contract.cct_category_id.category_price_ids) or False result_qty = worked_days.H140.number_of_hours result_rate = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H140')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount) if esMesAumento: # -- VALORES DE CATEGORIA -- # #current_value = contract.cct_category_id.current_value previus_category_price_ids_list = [cat_id for cat_id in contract.cct_category_id.category_price_ids if payslip.date_from > cat_id.from_date] previus_value = sorted(previus_category_price_ids_list)[0].value #basic_average = ((previus_value/30)*10) + ((current_value/30)*20) basic_average = ((previus_value/30)*10) + ((BASIC/30)*20) antiguedad_average = (basic_average*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') or 0.00)/100
# -- VALORES DE RX -- # #Verificar si existe este parametro en el payslip rx_average = 0.00 if inputs.H055: current_value_rx = payslip.rule_parameter('UPADEP_RX') parameter_list_ids = payslip.env['base.time.parameter'].search([('code','=','UPADEP_RX')],limit = 1) previus_version_upadep_rx_list = [version_id for version_id in parameter_list_ids[0].version_ids if payslip.date_from > version_id.date_from] previus_version_rx_value = sorted(previus_version_upadep_rx_list)[0].value rx_average = round(((int(previus_version_rx_value)/30)*10) + ((int(current_value_rx)/30)*20),2)

# -- CALCULO MES DE AUMENTO -- # if esMesAumento: # -- CALCULO DE VALORES CATEGORIA -- # #current_category_value = contract.cct_category_id.current_value previus_category_price_ids_list = [cat_id for cat_id in contract.cct_category_id.category_price_ids if payslip.date_from > cat_id.from_date] previus_value = previus_category_price_ids_list[0].value basic_average = ((previus_value/30)*10) + ((BASIC/30)*20) antiguedad_average = (basic_average*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') or 0.00)/100

# -- NUEVO BASICO -- # new_basic = basic_average + antiguedad_average + rx_average + feriados + patente new_hr_price = round((new_basic/contract.cct_id.basic_div),2)
#TODO: SE PODRIA MEJORAR CON FUNCIONES AUX # -- CALCULO HORAS DIURNAS AL 50% -- # if 'H140' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H140')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHD_50_UPADEP = worked_days.H140.number_of_hours result_OVHD_50_UPADEP = (new_hr_price*result_qty_OVHD_50_UPADEP)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS DIURNAS AL 100% -- # if 'H141' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H141')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHD_100_UPADEP = worked_days.H141.number_of_hours result_OVHD_100_UPADEP = (new_hr_price*result_qty_OVHD_100_UPADEP)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS NOC AL 50% -- # if 'H143' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H143')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP = worked_days.H143.number_of_hours result_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP = ((new_hr_price*result_qty_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP)*1.1333)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS NOC AL 100% -- # if 'H144' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H144')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP = worked_days.H144.number_of_hours result_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP = ((new_hr_price*result_qty_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP)*1.1333)*percentage else: # -- NO ES MES AUMENTO -- # basic_hr_price = categories.CBASIC/contract.cct_id.basic_div # -- CALCULO HORAS DIURNAS AL 50% -- # if 'H140' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H140')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHD_50_UPADEP = worked_days.H140.number_of_hours result_OVHD_50_UPADEP = (basic_hr_price*result_qty_OVHD_50_UPADEP)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS DIURNAS AL 100% -- # if 'H141' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H141')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHD_100_UPADEP = worked_days.H141.number_of_hours result_OVHD_100_UPADEP = (basic_hr_price*result_qty_OVHD_100_UPADEP)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS NOC AL 50% -- # if 'H143' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H143')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP = worked_days.H143.number_of_hours result_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP = ((basic_hr_price*result_qty_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP)*1.1333)*percentage
# -- CALCULO HORAS NOC AL 100% -- # if 'H144' in worked_days.dict.keys(): percentage = (payslip.env['hr.overtime.type'].search([('payroll_code','=','H144')],limit = 1)[0].add_percentage_amount)/100 result_qty_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP = worked_days.H144.number_of_hours result_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP = ((basic_hr_price*result_qty_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP)*1.1333)*percentage
result_name = 'PREMIO PRODUCCION' result = result_OVHD_50_UPADEP + result_OVHD_100_UPADEP + result_OVHNOC_50_UPADEP + result_OVHNOC_100_UPADEP
# -- Condiciones -- # input_142_AJ = inputs.H142_AJ or False result = input_142_AJ or False
# -- Condiciones -- # AJ_PREMIO_PROD = inputs.H155_AJ or False result = AJ_PREMIO_PROD or False

es_fulltime = contract.cct_id.basic_div >= 162 H_142 = result_rules.H142.total if worked_days.H142 and worked_days.H142.number_of_hours > 0 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #HS NOC (Comun) H_050 = result_rules.H050.total if inputs.H050 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #Feriado H_190 = result_rules.H190.total if inputs.H190 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #Adicional H_142AJ = result_rules.H142_AJ.total if inputs.H142_AJ and payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #Ajuste horas noc comun H_155AJ = inputs.H155_AJ.amount * inputs.H155_AJ.amount_qty if inputs.H155_AJ and payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #Ajuste premio produccion H_050AJ = inputs.H050_AJ.amount * inputs.H050_AJ.amount_qty if inputs.H050_AJ and payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #ajuste feriados H_186 = inputs.H186.amount * inputs.H186.amount_qty if inputs.H186 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 #Ajuste horas extras if es_fulltime: H_140 = result_rules.H140.total if worked_days.H140 and worked_days.H140.number_of_hours > 0 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 # Extra al 50 H_141 = result_rules.H141.total if worked_days.H141 and worked_days.H141.number_of_hours > 0 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 # Extra al 100 H_143 = result_rules.H143.total if worked_days.H143 and worked_days.H143.number_of_hours > 0 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 # nocturna al 50 H_144 = result_rules.H144.total if worked_days.H144 and worked_days.H144.number_of_hours > 0 and payslip.struct_id.code != 'AJUSTE-AR' else 0.00 # nocturna al 100 if payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR': result = H_142AJ + H_155AJ + H_050AJ + H_186 else: result = H_140 + H_141 + H_142 + H_143 + H_144 + H_050 + H_190 + H_142AJ + H_186 + H_050AJ + H_155AJ #Se suma ajuste part time por si el empleado cambia de modalidad else: if payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR': result = H_142AJ + H_155AJ or 0.00 + H_050AJ else: #Normal o Final H_155 = result_rules.H155.total if any(code in ['H140','H141','H143','H144'] for code in worked_days.dict.keys()) else 0.00 #premio produccion result = H_142 + H_050 + H_190 + H_155 + H_142AJ + H_155AJ + H_186 + H_050AJ #except: #result = 0.00

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato situacion_revista_afip = [5,13] revista = contract.afip_situacion_revista_id.afip_id not in situacion_revista_afip result = revista and contract.afiliado and not contract.afiliado_upsra or False

# -- Aporte Sindical (Afiliado) -- # afiliado_rate = contract.afiliado and -payslip.rule_parameter('UPADEP_RET_SIND_AFILIADO') afiliado_name = contract.afiliado and "UPADEP - APORTE SINDICAL"
result_rate = afiliado_rate result_name = afiliado_name
# -- Calculo -- # result = categories.GROSS

# -- Condiciones -- # sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato situacion_revista_afip = [5,13] revista = contract.afip_situacion_revista_id.afip_id not in situacion_revista_afip result = sindicato_upadep and revista and not contract.afiliado or False

# -- Calculo -- # result_rate = no_afiliado_rate result_name = no_afliliado_name result = categories.GROSS

# -- Aplicar topes -- # #tope_min = TOP_MIN > categories.GROSS and TOP_MIN or False #tope_max = TOP_MAX < categories.GROSS and TOP_MAX or False #apply_topes = tope_min or tope_max
# -- Calculo -- # result_rate = -payslip.rule_parameter('UPSRA_RATE') result = categories.GROSS

# -- Condiciones -- # #sindicato_upadep = "UPADEP" in contract.cct_id.sindicato situacion_revista_afip = [5,13] has_gross = categories.GROSS > 0 result = has_gross and contract.afip_situacion_revista_id.afip_id not in situacion_revista_afip

agentes_principales = ['AP4','AP0','AP5'] agentes_ingresantes = ['AI4','AI0','AI5'] encargado_grupo = ['EP5'] result_rate = -3 result_name = contract.afip_obra_social_id.name if payslip.struct_id.code == 'VAC-AR': result = H118 if result_rules.H118 else 0.00 else: if contract.cct_category_id.code in agentes_principales + agentes_ingresantes + encargado_grupo: if payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR': result = categories.GROSS or 0.00 else: if contract.cct_category_id.code in agentes_principales: #basic_full = current_contract.cct_categories.AP7 basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("AP8",payslip.date_from) #Agente principal ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 #result = basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS
if contract.cct_category_id.code in agentes_ingresantes: #basic_full = current_contract.cct_categories.AI7 #Agente ingresante FT basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("AI8",payslip.date_from) #Agente ingresante ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 #result = basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS
if contract.cct_category_id.code in encargado_grupo: #basic_full = current_contract.cct_categories.EP9 basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("EP8",payslip.date_from) #Encargado de grupo ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 #result = basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS
liq_normal = basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS base_liq_sac = liq_normal/2 liq_sac = categories.GROSS if categories.GROSS > base_liq_sac else base_liq_sac result_qty = max(0, min(30, worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days)) result = (liq_sac if payslip.struct_id.code == 'AR-SAC' else liq_normal)/30
#if contract.aporta_ft: # result_qty = 1 # basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("AP8",payslip.date_from) #Agente principal # ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 # #result_name = str(basic_full) +' '+ str(ant_full) # result_ # result = tope_min or tope_max or categories.GROSS else: tope_min = TOP_MIN > categories.GROSS and TOP_MIN or False tope_max = TOP_MAX < categories.GROSS and TOP_MAX or False apply_topes = tope_min or tope_max if payslip.struct_id.code == 'AJUSTE-AR': result = categories.GROSS or 0.00 else: if contract.aporta_ft: result_qty = 1 basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("AP8",payslip.date_from) #Agente principal base_ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 nueva_base = basic_full + base_ant_full result = categories.GROSS if categories.GROSS > nueva_base else nueva_base else: result = tope_min or tope_max or categories.GROSS

agentes_principales = ['AP4','AP0','AP5'] agentes_ingresantes = ['AI4','AI0','AI5'] encargado_grupo = ['EP5'] result_qty = max(0, min(30, worked_days.WORK100.number_of_days)) result_rate = current_contract.advantages.ADHERENTE_OS * -1 if payslip.struct_id.code == 'VAC-AR': result = H118 if result_rules.H118 else 0.00 else: if contract.cct_category_id.code in agentes_principales + agentes_ingresantes + encargado_grupo: if contract.cct_category_id.code in agentes_principales: #basic_full = current_contract.cct_categories.AP7 basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("AP8",payslip.date_from) #Agente principal ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00 #result = basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS

if contract.cct_category_id.code in encargado_grupo: #basic_full = current_contract.cct_categories.EP9 basic_full = payslip.env['hr.payslip'].get_category_value_price_by_code_and_date("EP8",payslip.date_from) #Encargado de grupo ant_full = (basic_full*employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years'))/100 if employee.get_service_duration_from_date(payslip.date_to).get('years') > 0.00 else 0.00
result = (basic_full+ant_full if basic_full+ant_full > categories.GROSS else categories.GROSS)/30 else: tope_min = TOP_MIN > categories.GROSS and TOP_MIN or False tope_max = TOP_MAX < categories.GROSS and TOP_MAX or False apply_topes = tope_min or tope_max result = (tope_min or tope_max or categories.GROSS)/30
